thread.section_title: Energia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Energia | energia.ie | 15 of 25
thread.title: GA

author: GA
title: GA
text: I have been with Energia less than a year but for now I'm happy with my choice. The deal to switch to it was good and I find the online service and customer service on the phone good. I would just like a couple of days more when I'm asked to provide the meter reading, maybe send the notice earlier?Sometimes if you are travelling you just don't have the chance even to ask a friend to do the reading for you..
